name: Automaton Direwolf (Bug)
description:
A false projection produced by compromised codes. The referent entity is an automaton pieced together with Old World technology. This rare type of humanoid automaton is equipped with a chainsaw on its right arm, presumably used for mining or construction operations.
In combat, Automaton Direwolf will use its chainsaw to Bleed enemies, dealing DoT.

skills.name: Felling Order
skills.description: Deals massive Physical DMG to a single target, with a high chance to inflict Bleed with every hit to this target.

skills.name: Lock On Target
skills.description: Locks Onto a single target. The next action on the target will cast "Felling Order."

skills.name: Disintegration Order
skills.description: Deals minor Physical DMG to a single target, with a high chance to inflict 1 stack of Bleed.

skills.name: Dismantle
skills.description: Deals minor Physical DMG to a single target, with a high chance to inflict 1 stack of Bleed.

skills.name: Targeting Order
skills.description: Locks on to 2 targets and casts Felling Order on them in the next action.
